data.actual_result: A 404 page loads first for all marketing pages before the actual page is loaded, which results in no embeds being generated by posting links to them in chat.
data.expected_result: The link preview to a marketing page woud load normally.
data.short_description: No link previews are generated in chat for the Discord marketing pages
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server. - Post a link to a marketing page in chat.
